Quick search

Description¶

Market robot Remarks:

  • all exchange data by DataFrame with index axis Timestamp

  • config.py - file with config constant

  • DataBase - package work with data base;

Notes¶

This is first version for test database. Next level implement class which give ability simulate Exchange:

  • class can add user;

  • user can ask current time;

  • use can ask history only before time;

  • user can buy and sold share;

Structure of database¶

Packages and files¶

CONFIG¶

FILE CONFIG

config.COMPANY = 'data/company.csv'¶

file with company name

config.DATABASE = 'sqlite:///data/database.db'¶

database

config.LOG_FILE = 'log/log.log'¶

log file name

config.LOG_FILE_COUNT = 2¶

max count of logs files

config.LOG_FILE_SIZE = 524288¶

max size of log file (bytes)

config.LOG_LEVEL = 10¶

level debug

DataBase¶

Package respond for create and communication with database.

  • exchange with external application by DataFrame;

  • implement method for usual task

  • manage reliability database;

  • implement method for usual task:

    • get data from database(as DataFrame);

    • put data (DataFrame) from DataFrame

data¶

Folder with data

company.csv

file with company names

test.db

data base

DataBase¶

Module is description of database

Company description.

class Database.Tables.Interval(**kwargs)[source]¶

Company description.

Company description.

Shares.

class Database.Tables.Time(**kwargs)[source]¶

Company description.

Manager¶

Module response for interaction with database.

class Database.Manager.Manager[source]¶

Class is manager of database:

  • create session;

  • give convinient method for frequency request:

    • put DataFrame in database (if there was the same record - ignore them);

    • get query from database as DataFrame;

get_company()[source]¶

Get list company in database

Returns

Return type

DataFrame

get_price(time, company=None)[source]¶

Get price for all company or specific company

Parameters

  • time (datetime) – time

  • company (str) – short name company

Returns

Return type

DataFrame

get_share(company, time1, time2, interval)[source]¶

get share for company from tim11 to time2 with interval

Parameters

  • company (str) – short name company

  • time1 (datetime) – start time

  • time2 (datetime) – end time

  • interval (str) – interval

Returns

Return type

DataFrame

put(company, date1, date2, interval)[source]¶

Put data ‘company’ with ‘interval’ from ‘data1’ to ‘data2’ in database

Parameters

  • company (str) – company secid

  • interval (str) – interval record (valid value ‘1m’‘10m’‘1h’‘1d’)

  • date1 (str) – data in format ‘2015-09-22’

  • date2 (str) – data in format ‘2015-09-22’

Return type
